ITEM.NAME: HCATLOADER
ITEM.SHOW_IF: ((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR310' OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOCAL=='false')

DEFAULT.IF: ((PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR1') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR2') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR212') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR213') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR301') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR310') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR401') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MapR_EMR')) AND (DISTRIBUTION != 'CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: MAPRED_JOB_TRACKER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND ((SUBTREE_START=='true') OR (INCOMING_LINK_TYPE=='iterate')) AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND PIG_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND PIG_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_2' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CLOUDERA') OR (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3') OR (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) AND PIG_VERSION!='MAPR401' AND PIG_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR' AND DISTRIBUTION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT'))

DEFAULT.IF: ((PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR1') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR2') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR212') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR213') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR301') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MAPR310') OR (PIG_VERSION == 'MapR_EMR')) AND (DISTRIBUTION != 'CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND (SUBTREE_START=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_JOBHISTORY_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND (SUBTREE_START=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_SCHEDULER_ADDRESS
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND (SUBTREE_START=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR')))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_STAGING_DIRECTORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND (SUBTREE_START=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401')))

PARAMETER.NAME: THRIFT_SERVER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR310' OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_DATANODE_HOSTNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false') AND (SUBTREE_START=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1') OR (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL=='false' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))) AND (SUBTREE_START=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: NOTE_HBASEMASTER_KERBEROS
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: Hbase kerberos settings are required only when the Load/Store function is set to HBaseStorage.

PARAMETER.NAME: USERNAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL=='false' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND ((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1') OR (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR'))) OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM'))) AND (SUBTREE_START=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: INPUT_FILENAME
PARAMETER.NOT_SHOW_IF: (S3_LOCATION_LOAD == 'true') OR ((LOCAL == 'false') AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR310' OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER') OR ((LOAD=='HBASESTORAGE') AND ((LOCAL=='true') OR ((PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_0') AND (PIG_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: DATABASE_NAME
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR310' OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: DEFINE_REGISTER_JAR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR310' OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER')

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the execution server.

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (LOCAL == 'false' AND (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4_YARN')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR310' OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT' OR DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') AND LOAD=='HCATLOADER' AND DEFINE_REGISTER_JAR=='true')

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: LOCAL == 'false' AND (SUBTREE_START=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR PIG_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT')))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL=='false' AND ((PIG_VERSION!='HDP_1_0' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_1_2' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_1_3' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND PIG_VERSION!='HDP_2_2' AND PIG_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND PIG_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR' AND PIG_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CLOUDERA') OR (PIG_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH3')) AND PIG_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR USE_KRB=='false')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (LOCAL=='false' AND (((PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (PIG_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_0') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_1_0_3_EMR') OR (PIG_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR') OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (PIG_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH3')) OR (PIG_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0')) AND USE_KRB=='true')) AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM'
